sonicScream.title: [name] emits a Sonic Scream!
sonicScream.desc: As an action, you can violently expel air in a 15-foot cone. When you do so, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a Wisdom saving throw.   This ability has no effect on constructs.

grovelCowerBeg.effect: Distracted|-desc 'Attacks against this opponent have advantage'|1
grovelCowerBeg.title: [name] uses Grovel, Cower, and Beg

secondHeart.title: [name] uses their Second Heart ability!
secondHeart.desc: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can’t use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

savingFace.title: [name] uses their Saving Face ability!
savingFace.desc: Trandoshans are careful not to show weakness in front of their allies, for fear of losing status. If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or a saving throw, you can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +5). Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.
